medical_drugs.description: Aspirin is a medication used to reduce pain, fever, or inflammation. It is often used to treat headaches, muscle aches, toothaches, and colds.
medical_drugs.best_use: Best used to relieve mild to moderate pain and reduce fever or inflammation.
medical_drugs.instructions: Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours as needed. Do not exceed 8 tablets in 24 hours. Take with a full glass of water.

medical_drugs.description: Amoxicillin is an antibiotic used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infections. It works by stopping the growth of bacteria.
medical_drugs.best_use: Best used for treating bacterial infections such as ear infections, bladder infections, pneumonia, and gonorrhea.
medical_drugs.instructions: Take 500 mg every 8 hours, or as directed by a doctor. Can be taken with or without food.

medical_drugs.description: Paracetamol is a common painkiller used to treat aches and pain. It can also be used to reduce fever.
medical_drugs.best_use: Best used to treat mild to moderate pain, including headaches, toothaches, and fevers.
medical_drugs.instructions: Take 1-2 tablets (500 mg each) every 4-6 hours as needed. Do not exceed 8 tablets in 24 hours.

medical_drugs.description: Ibuprofen is used to reduce fever and treat pain or inflammation caused by many conditions such as headache, toothache, arthritis, or minor injuries.
medical_drugs.best_use: Best used to relieve pain, reduce fever, and decrease inflammation.
medical_drugs.instructions: Take 200-400 mg every 4-6 hours as needed. Do not exceed 1200 mg in 24 hours without a doctor's direction.

medical_drugs.description: Ciprofloxacin is an antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections. It is particularly effective against gram-negative bacteria.
medical_drugs.best_use: Best used for treating respiratory infections, urinary tract infections, and skin infections.
medical_drugs.instructions: Take 500 mg every 12 hours with a full glass of water, preferably on an empty stomach.

medical_drugs.description: Metformin is used to control high blood sugar in people with type 2 diabetes. It helps restore your body's proper response to insulin.
medical_drugs.best_use: Best used to improve blood sugar control in people with type 2 diabetes.
medical_drugs.instructions: Take 500 mg twice a day with meals. Do not crush or chew the tablets.

medical_drugs.description: Omeprazole is used to treat certain stomach and esophagus problems (such as acid reflux and ulcers).
medical_drugs.best_use: Best used to reduce stomach acid and treat conditions like GERD and stomach ulcers.
medical_drugs.instructions: Take one 20 mg tablet daily, preferably before a meal.

medical_drugs.description: Loratadine is an antihistamine that reduces the effects of natural histamine in the body. It is used to treat allergy symptoms.
medical_drugs.best_use: Best used to relieve symptoms of hay fever, allergies, and hives.
medical_drugs.instructions: Take one 10 mg tablet once a day. Can be taken with or without food.

medical_drugs.description: Simvastatin is used to help lower bad cholesterol and fats (such as LDL and triglycerides) and raise good cholesterol (HDL) in the blood.
medical_drugs.best_use: Best used to reduce the risk of heart disease by lowering cholesterol levels.
medical_drugs.instructions: Take 20-40 mg once daily in the evening.

medical_drugs.description: Losartan is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) and to help protect the kidneys from damage due to diabetes.
medical_drugs.best_use: Best used for lowering blood pressure and reducing the risk of strokes in patients with heart disease.
medical_drugs.instructions: Take 50 mg once daily, with or without food.
